name: Warhammer 40,000: Fire Warrior
description:
Warhammer 40,000: Fire Warrior is an action-shooter game developed by Kuju Entertainment and Games Workshop Interactive. It was originally released in 2003. THQ published the game. Warhammer 40,000: Fire Warrior has a Metascore of 56, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Warhammer 40,000: Fire Warrior on PlayStation 2 and PC. You can purchase the game on GOG.
